author: Ryan Daws
description:
Critics fear the revised NO FAKES Act has morphed from targeted AI deepfakes protection into sweeping censorship powers. What began as a seemingly reasonable attempt to tackle AI-generated deepfakes has snowballed into something far more troubling, according to digital rights advocates. The much-discussed Nurture Originals, Foster Art, and Keep Entertainment Safe (NO FAKES) Act – […]

The post NO FAKES Act: AI deepfakes protection or internet freedom threat? appeared first on AI News.
title: NO FAKES Act: AI deepfakes protection or internet freedom threat?
